trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around August 23rd 2012
Summary: I was driving South on Hwy 128 on my way to work around 5:55AM and I noticed this extreemly bright greenish white object in the sky over head. I tried to keep it in my line of vision, but lost it when I switched to Rte. 1.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to work from Salem, MA to Boston, MA on Hwy 128 S. around 5:55AM, near the Rte. 1 exit, I noticed a extremely bright greenish-white object up in the sky as plain as day. It was moving pretty fast, but I was able to follow it until I had to take the Rte. 1 exit. Once I dipped below the Hwy, I lost sight of it. When I got into work, two of my coworkers also said they saw it - one of which said that he watched it until it just disappeared, no trails or debris or anything - just gone.
